hero.title: Hi, I'm Steve.
hero.title2: thank you for stopping by and reviewing my work.
hero.des0: I am a well-rounded developer with a passion for pushing the limits of what software web applications can do, and finding the right tools to do so.
hero.p1: Currently consulting and freelancing, open to new full-time or contract opportunities.
hero.des2: My preferred tech stack is React, Javascript/Typescript, Node, HTML, CSS/SCSS/Tailwind,
hero.des3: and am comfortable working with Vue and Angular.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some projects that I have coded and designed, both alone and with various teams.

aos-ipad.subtitle: Apple Online Store
aos-ipad.description: Built out the pages and components (desktop, tablet, and mobile) for the Apple Online Store.

ehealthhome.subtitle: eHealth Home Page redesign
ehealthhome.description: Lead the redesign of a version 2 of the corporate site.  With the design team, prototyped pages and components to finalize overall look and feel.

apple-adobe.subtitle: Adobe Landing Page
apple-adobe.description: This landing page was developed for the Apple Online Store.  This page existed in a previous version of the site.

ehealthsearch.subtitle: eHealth Search Results page
ehealthsearch.description: Prototyped the redesign of version 2 of the search results page.  Also contributed in building out various components as a part of the team.

uptake.subtitle: Uptake site redesign
uptake.description: Worked with a team to completely redesign and develop this travel review, information, and recommendation site.

ooma.subtitle: Ooma site redesign
ooma.description: Worked with a team to design and develop this state of the art phone service provider.

hulu.subtitle: Hulu site clone (personal project)
hulu.description: This is a personal project that is a method of continued learning and to help re-enforce my skillset in Next.js, Tailwind, Authentication, fetch API, etc.

google.subtitle: Google site clone (personal project)
google.description: This is a personal project that is a method of continued learning and to help re-enforce my skillset in Next.js, Tailwind, Authentication, Search, etc.

steve-resume.subtitle: My resume portfolio
steve-resume.description: Older version of my online resume to showcase my skills viewable at:  https://my-portfolio-nine-eosin.vercel.app

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I am passionate about design coupled with development, thus creating a great user experience. These are the tools I am most familiar with and build things every day.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Here are some great companies that I worked for, and a few personal projects.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to set up a quick conversation.

citation.content: Learning to code is useful no matter what your career ambitions are.
citation.author: - Arianna Huffington
